title: don't consider fees while voting
content:
fees is not an issue. I want to know purely based on its worth and degree value

[View Poll](https://www.reddit.com/poll/14zg6xu)

comments.body: can you also state your reasons pls?
If you're getting into PES via PESSAT, it's not worth it. Different case if it was through KCET.

If fees aren't an issue, pick PES since that's your best option. Although I'd argue that even if you're financially well off the money isn't worth it here and you'll have a comparable life via the other two options
thanks for the reply. yes but in rankings I always see people say pes>bms but since it was ec campus was not sure
pes is above bms, placements-wise and maybe infra-wise too. It doesn't matter whether it's RR or EC campus. The same companies visit both the campuses.
It is better regardless of campus but you have a better college life in Bms as compared to pesâ€™ hectic academics
What should I choose bmsce or msrit?
Both are good.. whichever is near your home.
Again as I said both are good.. I would personally go for bmsce.
Older and has good reputation in blore.. and is famous for being less stressful.
